```{r}
df <- read_excel("/Users/jann/Desktop/sf1_mean.xlsx", sheet=1, col_names=T)
dft <- t(df)
head(dft)
# df <- read.tcsv("minidataMEAN.XLSX", header=T)
# df = head(df, -1)
# head(df)
tail(dft)
print("REMEMBER TO REMOVE LAST COMMA")
```

```{r}
result <- ""
for(i in 2:nrow(dft)){
  sofar <- "["
  for(j in 2:ncol(dft)-1){ #first and last are taken care of after the for loop
    sofar <- cat(sofar, dft[i,j], ",", sep="")
  }
  sofar <- cat(sofar, dft[i,ncol(dft)], "]", sep="")
  cat(result, sofar, ",", sep="","\n")
}
```

```{r, echo=F}
print("REMEMBER TO REMOVE LAST COMMA")
```
